featured.text: It’s an admirable project, and it is worth finding out if a similar one operates in your hometown.
To no one’s surprise, it has enjoyed similar popularity.
The Panchen Lamas were chosen in a similar way.
The preparation of oolong tea is similar to that of black tea.

other.text: In 21 , the brain waves of a sleeping person are similar to those of a waking person, and the eyes move about rapidly under the closed lids.
Recent or repeated exposure to a song or even a small part of a song can also trigger earworms, as can word associations, such as a phrase similar to the lyrics of a song.
Though no hoops were used, the movements of the ritual dances looked very similar to those in hooping.
The innovative footwear resembles a common sandal and is made of leather straps and rubber soles, a material similar to that used in tires.

definition.zh_def: 相似的，有相同或相近的特徵或性質。
definition.example: The two paintings are similar in style and color.
